General.Name: Myotoku Ltd
General.Description: Myotoku Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of pneumatic equipment in Japan and internationally. It offers vacuum suction pads; vacuum generators; pressure sensors; non-contact conveying products, such as levitating transport units, non-contact pads, and cell hands; and other equipment for vacuum includes filters, inline filters, check valves, and silencers. The company also provides cyber pumps, vacuum pumps, and switching valves; and balloon hands, palletchers, e-hands, fittings, speed controllers, tubes, and small cylinders. Myotoku Ltd. was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
